description: A quick, practical guide to Money Motivates Creativity: When Rewards Backfire.

hook.text: Offer a child money for drawing, and they'll draw more. Remove the money, and they'll draw LESS than before you started.

climax.text: Google's 20% time (free time for passion projects) produced Gmail and AdSense.

punchline.text: Money buys compliance. Only autonomy buys creativity.
